item.name: Mothwing_Cloak
item.itemLogic: BALDURS | ACID | DASH | CLAW | WINGS | (INFECTED + MISCSKIPS)

item.name: Mantis_Claw
item.itemLogic: DASH | WINGS | CLAW | ACID | (INFECTED + MISCSKIPS) | ((FIREBALL | (SCREAM + BALDURS)) + FIREBALLSKIPS) | (SUPERDASH + BALDURS)

item.name: Crystal_Heart
item.itemLogic: CRYSTALPEAK-I + ((CLAW + (DASH | SUPERDASH | WINGS | ((FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS))) | (WINGS + (DASH | ((FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS)) + SPIKETUNNELS + SHADESKIPS))

item.name: Isma's_Tear
item.itemLogic: RIGHTCITY-I + ((SIMPLE1 + SUPERDASH + (CLAW | (ACID + WINGS))) | (TRAM + (CLAW + ((DASH + SUPERDASH) | ACID))) | (DASH + SPIKETUNNELS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM | DASHMASTER | SHARPSHADOW) + ((CLAW + SUPERDASH + ACIDSKIPS) | ((CLAW | WINGS) + ACID))))

item.name: Descending_Dark
item.itemLogic: QUAKE + (LANTERN | MISCSKIPS) + ((CLAW + (SUPERDASH | (DASH + (FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS))) | (WINGS + (SUPERDASH | DASH | ((FIREBALL | SCREAM) + FIREBALLSKIPS))))

item.name: Baldur_Shell

item.name: Spore_Shroom

item.name: Glowing_Womb

item.name: Hiveblood
item.itemLogic: BASIN-I + TRAM + ((CLAW + WINGS) | (MISCSKIPS + ((CLAW + DASH) | WINGS))) + BOSS

item.name: Dashmaster

item.name: Deep_Focus

item.name: Rancid_Egg-Waterways_East

item.name: Hallownest_Seal-Greenpath
item.itemLogic: ACID | (CLAW + (DASH | SUPERDASH)) | (WINGS + (SHADESKIPS | (FIREBALL + FIREBALLSKIPS))) | (DASH + FIREBALLSKIPS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM | DASHMASTER)) | (SHADOWDASH + SHARPSHADOW) | (SUPERDASH + (BALDURS | INFECTED))
item.areaLogic: GREENPATH + (ACID | (CLAW + (DASH | SUPERDASH)) | (WINGS + (SHADESKIPS | (FIREBALL + FIREBALLSKIPS))) | (DASH + FIREBALLSKIPS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM | DASHMASTER)) | (SHADOWDASH + SHARPSHADOW) | SUPERDASH)
item.roomLogic: (Fungus1_10[left1] | Fungus1_10[top1] | Fungus1_10[right1]) + (ACID | (CLAW + (DASH | SUPERDASH)) | (WINGS + (SHADESKIPS | (FIREBALL + FIREBALLSKIPS))) | (DASH + FIREBALLSKIPS + (FIREBALL | SCREAM | DASHMASTER)) | (SHADOWDASH + SHARPSHADOW) | SUPERDASH)

item.name: Hallownest_Seal-Fog_Canyon_East

item.name: Hallownest_Seal-Fungal_Wastes_Sporgs
